japanese: 一花、来たぞ。
translation: Ichika, I'm here.

japanese:
はーい。
お待たせしちゃってごめんね。
もうすぐ着替え終わるから、そこで待ってて。
translation:
Hey.
Sorry for keeping you waiting.
I'll finish changing soon, so please wait there.

japanese: あいつら来てるみたいだぞ。
translation: It looks like they've arrived.

japanese:
ったく、なに企んでんだか。
高校生の頃から変わっちゃいねぇ。
問題児だらけだ。
translation:
Good grief, what are they plotting?
They haven't changed since high school.
They're all troublemakers.

japanese: それって私も含めて？
translation: Does that include me too?

japanese:
当たり前だろ。
ある意味では、お前に一番悩まされたぞ。
translation: Yes, you too! Actually, you troubled me the most.

japanese: （そういや今朝も夢を見たっけな）
translation: (Come to think of it, I had a dream this morning.)

japanese:
（あの日を何度、夢に見るんだろう。
　そんな深く脳裏に刻まれるほどの――）
translation:
(How many times have I dreamt of that day?
 It's etched so deeply into my mind.)

japanese: （とんでもない悪夢だ）
translation: (It was such a terrible nightmare.)

japanese: お待たせ。
translation: Sorry to keep you waiting.

japanese: まだ俺は夢を見ているのか？
translation: Am I still dreaming?

japanese: 五つ子ゲーム、ファイナルだよ。
translation: It's the final quintuplets game.

japanese: 愛があれば見分けられるよね。
translation: If you love me, you can tell us apart, right?

japanese:
皆様、本日はご多忙の中、
僕たちの結婚披露宴にお集まりいただきまして
誠にありがとうございます。
translation:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for taking time
out of your busy schedules
to attend our wedding reception today.

japanese:
これまでお世話になった方々の前で
ようやく挙式を執り行えたことを、
大変嬉しく思います。
translation:
I am very happy to finally have our wedding ceremony
in front of everyone who has supported us so far.

japanese: 本当に……長い道のりでした。
translation: It...really has been a long road.

japanese: 五つ子ゲームって……。
translation: The quintuplets game...

japanese: 馬鹿か！　ってか一花以外の４人！
translation: What a joke! Except for Ichika, you other four!

japanese:
こんなお遊びでウェディングドレス着てんじゃねぇ！
なにしてるかわかってんのか！
translation:
What are you doing, wearing wedding dresses
for this kind of game?
Do you even know what you're doing?

japanese: 確かにちょっと複雑だけど……。
translation: Sure, it's a bit complicated...

japanese: 思いついちゃったしねー。
translation: But we just thought of it, you know...

japanese: それにお遊びじゃないですよーだ。
translation: And it's not just for fun.

japanese: これでも花嫁の親族だから。
translation: We're also relatives of the bride.

japanese: っていうのは嘘で私が花嫁本人です。
translation:
Well, that's a lie.
I'm the bride.

japanese: 違うよ、私だよ。
translation: No. It's me.

japanese: 花嫁といえば私！
translation: I'm the bride!

japanese: 風太郎ならわかるよね？
translation: You can tell, right, Futaro?

japanese:
ったく、馬鹿野郎……。
少しは分別のつく大人になったかと思えば。
translation:
Geez, you idiots...
Just when I thought
you'd become somewhat sensible adults.

japanese:
相変わらずのようで安心した。
俺を舐めんな。
translation:
It's a relief you still haven't changed.
Don't underestimate me.

japanese: お前だ。
translation: It's you.

japanese:
宴もたけなわとなりましたが
そろそろお時間のようです。
translation:
It seems the party is at its peak,
but it looks like it's time to wrap things up.

japanese:
最後に新婦様から親御様へ
感謝を込めたメッセージです。
translation:
Lastly, a message of gratitude
from the bride to her parents.

japanese:
お父さん、そして天国のお母さん。
私が今日、この日を迎えられたのは
２人がいたからに他なりません。
translation:
To my father, and my mother in heaven,
I would not be here today
if it weren't for the both of you.

japanese:
お母さんは私が小さな頃に
いなくなってしまいましたが、
その教えと愛はいつまでも私の中に残っています。
translation:
Although my mother left me when I was young,
her teachings and her love will always stay with me.

japanese: そして、お父さん。
translation: And, Dad.

japanese:
突然のことに、お父さんを受け入れられなくて
困らせてしまったこともあったと思います。
translation:
I know there were times when you were unsure
about accepting our relationship,
but you've watched over us until today.

japanese:
それでも、今日まであるがままの私たちを
見守ってくれて――
translation:
Still, until now, thank you for watching over us
just as we are%p-2;――

japanese:
そして、女優という夢を見つけ出した私を
応援してくれて、ありがとうございます。
translation:
And, thank you for supporting me
as I discovered my dream of becoming an actress.

japanese:
そして、姉妹のみんなもまた、
夢を叶える力となって支えてくれました。
translation:
And to my sisters,
you've always been a source of strength
in helping me achieve my dreams.

japanese: はっ？　私？
translation: Huh? Me?

japanese: お前が二乃だ。
translation: You're Nino.

japanese:
次女の二乃は、時には姉のように
私を引っ張ってくれました。
translation:
The next quintuplet, Nino, sometimes pulls me along
like an older sister.

japanese: どんな時でも真っ直ぐに自分を貫く――
translation: She always lives true to herself no matter what%p-2;――

japanese: そんな生き方を、いつだって尊敬しています。
translation: I always admired her way of life.

japanese: そうよ、正解！
translation: Yup, that's correct!

japanese:
はいはい、よかったわね。
次どうぞ！
translation:
Well, well. Good job.
Next, please!

japanese: なんでこんな時に……。
translation: Why, at a time like this...

japanese: 一花だけ当てればいいのよ。
translation: You just need to identify Ichika.

japanese:
お前の強さは、その人一倍の弱さの裏返しだ。
厳しさも、それだけ大きな愛情があるから
なんだろうな。
translation:
Your strength is in your compassion for others. 
Even though you act tough, I suppose it's because 
you have so much love to give.

japanese:
あの頃の俺は、
その答えを見つけることができなかった。
すまん。
translation:
I couldn't find the answer at that time.
I'm sorry.

japanese:
いいわよ……。
私は……後悔してない……。
translation:
It's okay...
I...have no regrets...

japanese: そうか。
translation: I see.

japanese:
ていうか、なんなのよホント……。
急に、こんな……。
translation:
What the hell is this...
Why, all of a sudden...

japanese:
せっかくだからな。
俺も言いたいことを言わせてもらう。
translation:
While we're at it.
Let me say what I have to say.

japanese: 次はお前だ、三玖。
translation: Next, you're Miku.

japanese:
三玖は、妹であり、同時に親友のような存在です。
いつも隣に並んで、たくさんの想いを
伝え合ってきました。
translation:
Miku is my little sister and yet at the same time,
my best friend. We've always told each other what was 
on our minds and been by each other's side.

japanese:
夢のために、自分自身を変えていける。
そんな強さを持つ三玖は、自慢の妹です。
translation:
Miku has the strength to change herself for her dreams.
She's my pride and joy as a little sister.

japanese: うん、正解。
translation: Yes, you're correct.

japanese:
たまに不安になる……。
私……うまくやれてるかな……。
translation:
Sometimes I get worried...
Am I...doing okay...?

japanese: 俺が答えるまでもない。
translation: There's no need for me to even answer that.

japanese:
お前はそうやって常に自分の不安と戦ってきた。
そうして勝ちえた結果は、間違いなくお前の戦果だ。
translation:
You've always fought against your insecurities. 
And as a result you've accomplished so much and more.

japanese:
自分を信じろ。
お前は昔からできる奴だ。
translation:
Believe in yourself.
You are and always have been capable of great things.

japanese:
そう言ってくれると思ってた。
ありがとうフータロー。
translation:
I thought you'd say that.
Thank you, Futaro.

japanese: 四葉。
translation: Yotsuba.

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Yes.

japanese:
四葉は私が一番お姉ちゃんしてきた妹です。
その分、可愛くて仕方ありません。
translation:
Yotsuba is the sister I've been the closest to
as an older sister.
Besides, being so unbelievably cute that I can't help it.

japanese:
もちろん、そんな四葉から教えられたことも
たくさんあります。
translation:
Of course, there are many things
I've been taught by you as well, Yotsuba.

japanese:
いつだって全力で駆けていく背中は、
頼もしいことだってあるんですよ。
translation:
There's something reliable about
watching you run forward with all your might.

japanese:
お前の人助けはいまも続いてる。
それは、お前がそうありたいと望んでのことだよな。
translation:
You keep helping people, even now.
That's because it's what you want to do, right?

japanese:
勝手を言って悪いが、
これからもそういう四葉でいてほしい。
お前に助けられたひとりとして、願っている。
translation:
I'm sorry for being presumptuous, but I hope you
continue to be that kind of person in the future.
As someone who was helped by you, I wish for that.

japanese:
もちろんです。
自分で決めて進んできた道ですから。
translation:
Of course.
It's the path I've chosen and walked on my own.

japanese:
勝手なんて言わないでください。
認めてもらえてるって、嬉しいです。
translation:
Please don't say that it's presumptuous of you.
I'm happy to know that I'm being acknowledged.

japanese: ああ。
translation: Yeah.

japanese: 残るはお前だ、五月。
translation: And finally, Itsuki.

japanese: えっ。
translation: Eeh.

japanese: えっ。
translation: Eeh.

japanese: あのー、私、一花なんだけどな？
translation: Uuum, it's Ichika, ya know?

japanese:
五月は、末っ子だけど
５人の中で一番のしっかり者です。
私のこともいつも助けてくれました。
translation:
Itsuki, despite being the youngest,
you're the most dependable among the five of us.
You've always helped me out.

japanese:
どんな時でも一生懸命で、
ちょっぴり頑固なところもあって――
translation:
You always try your best at all times,
and a bit stubborn at times%p-2;――

japanese:
いまは、先生という夢を叶えて、
たくさんの生徒を助け導く毎日です。
translation:
Now, you're living your dream as a teacher,
helping and guiding numerous students every day.

japanese: なーんて！
translation: Juuust kidding!

japanese:
じゃーん、五月でした！
どう？　うまくなったでしょ？
translation:
Ta-da! It is me, Itsuki!
How was that? Did I do well?

japanese: この……焦らせやがって……。
translation: Even now...teasing me like this...

japanese: この際だから言わせてもらうが！
translation: I'm gonna say this now while I got the chance!

japanese:
お前に会ってからだ！
俺の人生が狂い始めたのは！
translation:
You're the reason my life went off the rails!
It was all in meeting you!

japanese: 諸悪の根源！　妖怪カレー食い女！
translation: The root of all evil! The curry-loving yokai woman!

japanese:
……っ！
わ、私だって！
translation:
...!
W-well, I never!

japanese:
あなたと会うまで、こんなにデリカシーのない人が
いるなんて想像もつきませんでした！
あたまでっかち！　天然キス魔！
translation:
Before I met you, I could have never imagined
that there could be someone so lacking in
delicacy! You smart-ass! Compulsive kissing dummy!

japanese:
やっぱり、あなたとは一生
馬が合いそうにありません！
translation: I just don't think we'll ever get along, you and I!

japanese: 五月……昔の口調に戻ってる。
translation: Itsuki's...using her old way of speaking again.

japanese: 仕方ないよ、フータロー相手だとね。
translation: Well, it's to be expected with Futaro around.

japanese: はぁ……ったく……。
translation: Aargh... Geez...

japanese:
で、余ったお前が一花な。
はい全問正解。
translation:
And, the last one is you, Ichika.
Yep. I got a perfect score.

japanese:
ええ～？
あっさりしてるなぁ、もう。
translation:
Huuuh?
Really? That was really easy, wasn't it.

japanese:
姉妹のみんながいなかったら、
私の人生はまったく別のものになっていたでしょう。
translation:
If it weren't for my sisters,
my life would have been completely different.

japanese:
長女ということが重荷に感じる時もあったけれど、
その何倍、何百倍も楽しい毎日を過ごしてきました。
translation:
There were times when being the eldest
felt like a burden, but they've made each day 
a hundred times more enjoyable.

japanese:
これだけ長く付き合ってりゃ嫌でも覚える。
俺は家庭教師だったが、お前たちからも
多くのことを教わった。
translation:
You can't help but grow when you've been together this long. 
I may have been the tutor at first but I've learned so much from all of you.

japanese:
私は、みんなと五つ子の姉妹として、
みんなのお姉ちゃんとして生まれることができて
幸せでした。
translation:
I'm happy that I was able to be born
as a sister of quintuplets.
And as your older sister, it's been a blessing.

japanese:
お前たち五つ子に出会えたこと。
数少ない俺の自慢だ。
translation: Meeting you quintuplets is one of my proudest achievements.

japanese:
人から見たら
不思議なところも多くあるだろうけれど――
translation:
There may be many things
that people find strange about us, but%p-2;――

japanese: 私は、そんな家族が大好きです。
translation: I love my family, so much.
